channel.title: How do you make a npc?
channel.description: Hey, I have a question again. How do you make a new NPC. I mean I a place for KBD to spawn but I want to make another one spawn somewhere else. Can I do this by just changeing the pos and it will still be in the place I set it to AND the new place or do I have to copy the code and paste it or something else I don't know. I use DDSspec source. Thanks!

item.title: How do you make a npc?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.source: How do you make a npc?
